Resistance.help: Souls are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Immobilize and Slow. They are also resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Negative, and Toxic damage. They can cast Ghastly Blasts, Life Drain, and can hold foes with a Necroplasmic Grasp.
Resistance.shortHelp: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Immobilize, Slow, Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Negative, Toxic

Phase_Shift.help: Ghosts can Phase Shift into the negative plane and becomes out of sync with normal space. While Phase Shifted, they are in touch with their native plane and can regenerate quickly.

Ghastly_Blast.help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by a Ghastly Blast.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Life_Drain.help: The Ghost has drained your life to heal herself. Your chance to hit is reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} heals itself for {Damage} points of health.

Enchant.help: This Ghost has been Enchanted. It can now cast Life Drain.

Necroplasmic_Grasp.help: The Ghost has enveloped you in it's Necroplasmic Grasp. You are Held as your life is drained.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Empower.help: This Ghost has been Empowered. It can now cast Necroplasmic Grasp.
